name: Epidemic (Attic Muse)
description:
Epidemic is a mini-game about strategically spreading your virus amongst a small population and earning rewards that can be used to purchase upgrades.

I've been making games as a hobby for four or five years now, but I still kind of suck because one-by-one I drop every project I start, often due to my dream just being too big. Finally I decided that if I ever wanted to get better I needed to follow through for once and take a game from an idea to a completed entity.

But to do this I needed to start small, so I decided to take a page out of the game jam playbook: I picked a theme (found one using this generator) and set a hard deadline of two weeks, by which point I would release the game. Now that time has come and I present to you Epidemic. It's not going to blow any minds, win any awards or climb to the top of the charts, but I hope you enjoy it nonetheless! Leave a comment letting me know what you think, and share this page if you liked it!
